thread.title: Dad pens hilarious notes after his kids are late to school
thread.title_full: Dad pens hilarious notes after his kids are late to school

title: Dad pens hilarious notes after his kids are late to school
text:
Dad pens hilarious notes after his kids are late to school Published 3:51 PM EDT Oct 19, 2015 A Large Text Photos 
Seth King, a father of five from Salt Lake City, said he was tired of his children being late to school. 
Instead of penning the average excuse for his children’s teachers, he decided to pen painfully detailed notes that blame “The Walking Dead,” “The Dark Knight Rises,” the announcers of Major League Baseball and many others for his children’s truancy. 
Check out some of the best notes below: A photo posted by Mr. King (@latenotes) on Oct 19, 2015 at 8:37am PDT A photo posted by Mr. King (@latenotes) on Oct 13, 2015 at 6:57am PDT A photo posted by Mr. King (@latenotes) on Oct 8, 2015 at 8:03am PDT A photo posted by Mr. King (@latenotes) on Oct 8, 2015 at 8:00am PDT A photo posted by Mr. King (@latenotes) on Sep 11, 2015 at 10:17am PDT
